update.title: Firmware update
update.warning: The upgrade process preserves user files and settings from /mnt/data only, any third-party software will be removed. We recommend to make a backup!

errors.unavailable: Firmware update service is not available
errors.stalled: Firmware update stalled, something gone wrong
errors.reboot: It tooks too long to reboot

errors.timeout: Timeout exceed. Reload page and try again
errors.unavailableToDownload: Can't reach file. Copy it from
